examples.example: 今天出门正好碰到了许久未见的老朋友，真是太开心了。

translate.english: Going out today just happened to meet an old friend who hasn't seen for a long time. It's really so happy.

examples.example: 我正好完成了工作，就接到了朋友打来的电话，约我一起去看电影。

translate.english: I just finished my work when I received a call from a friend, inviting me to go to the movies together.

examples.example: 我正好路过面包店，就买了一个香喷喷的面包，感觉很满足。

translate.english: I just passed by the bakery and bought a fragrant bread, feeling very satisfied.
